Name: Pull the Thread
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy that's been stitched together with another enemy.

Name: Patch
Description:
Deal 1 damage.
Gain X life, where X is twice the largest number of enemies that are stitched together.

Name: Tangle
Description: Deal 1 damage to one or two enemies. If those enemies are already stitched together, also subdue those enemies.

Name: Puncture
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If you are damaging an enemy that's stitched together with another enemy, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Bring Together
Description: Deal 2 damage to each enemy that isn't stitched together with another enemy.
